scripts.docker-build: docker build -t cshub-shared -t cshubnl/shared:dev ../cshub-shared && docker build -t cshubnl/client:dev ../cshub-client && docker build -t cshubnl/server:dev ../cshub-server
scripts.docker-push: docker push cshubnl/shared:dev && docker push cshubnl/client:dev && docker push cshubnl/server:dev
